cause.description:
Our mission is to frustrate, educate and motivate the church to communicate, with uncompromising clarity, the truth of Jesus Christ.
Church Marketing Sucks (http://www.churchmarketingsucks.com) is a part of the Center for Church Communication (http://www.cfcclabs.org), a non-profit organization dedicated to helping the church matter.
What Can You Do?
1. Get Involved: -Tell your friends, pastor, mom. -Join the Church Marketing Lab (http://www.flickr.com/groups/cfcc/) and help churches get better. -Comment on CMS (http://www.churchmarketingsucks.com). -Write for CMS (http://www.churchmarketingsucks.com/bios/guestblogger.html). -Find a church marketing job (http://jobs.cfcclabs.org) or a freelance project (http://freelance.cfcclabs.org). -Become a fan of the Church Marketing Sucks page (http://www.facebook.com/pages/Church-Marketing-Sucks/145169926178#/pages/Church-Marketing-Sucks/145169926178?ref=ts).
2. Donate -Give cash, either below or directly (http://www.churchmarketingsucks.com/support.html). -Advertise on CMS (http://www.cfcclabs.org/advertising.html).
3. Pray
1. Frustrate: Something's wrong with your church. Something's wrong with the Church. Church marketing efforts and communication in general suck.
2. Educate: We love the church, but it needs some help. We've got the greatest story in the world, but we don't know how to tell it.
3. Motivate: This isn't simply about putting butts in pews or selling glossy postcards. It's about helping the church be the Church.
cause.name: Church Marketing Sucks
